game.s_dis: Papa's Scooperia is a fun restaurant management game where you bake cookies, scoop ice cream, and top sundaes for customers in Oniontown.
game.l_dis:
Papa's Scooperia ‚Äì Bake, Scoop & Serve Sweet Treats

Papa's Scooperia is one of the most popular games in the Papa Louie series. Stranded in Oniontown without luggage, you‚Äôre offered a job at Papa‚Äôs brand-new ice cream shop. Your task: bake cookies, scoop ice cream, add toppings, and serve delicious sundaes to customers while keeping up with demand.

What is Papa's Scooperia?

Papa's Scooperia is a time-management simulation game where you juggle multiple stations‚Äîmixing dough, baking cookies, scooping ice cream, and adding syrups, toppings, and extras. The better you balance speed and accuracy, the more tips and rewards you‚Äôll earn.

How to Play Papa's Scooperia?

  • Take Orders: Customers will request specific cookie and ice cream sundae combinations.
  • Bake Cookies: Prepare cookie dough and bake it to perfection.
  • Scoop Ice Cream: Add ice cream scoops and toppings as ordered.
  • Serve Customers: Deliver the dessert exactly as requested to earn tips.
  • Upgrade & Unlock: Use tips to buy new ingredients, shop d√©cor, and upgrades.

Why Play Papa's Scooperia Unblocked?

Papa's Scooperia Unblocked allows you to enjoy this sweet cooking adventure anytime, anywhere‚Äîwhether at school, work, or home‚Äîwithout restrictions.

Key Features

  • Cookie & Ice Cream Combo: Create custom sundaes with baked cookies and ice cream.
  • Multi-Station Gameplay: Balance baking, scooping, and topping stations.
  • Customer Variety: Serve quirky characters with unique sundae requests.
  • Upgrades & Rewards: Unlock new toppings, d√©cor, and gameplay features.
  • Mini-Games: Play fun side games between shifts to earn prizes.

Ice Cream Sundae Challenge üç®

Papa's Scooperia is a test of multitasking and dessert-making skills. Can you bake, scoop, and serve your way to the top of Oniontown?
